subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Spanish rookie Pablo Larrazabal won the French Open for his first European Tour victory, closing with a four-under 67 to beat Colin Montgomerie by four strokes at Versailles. Larrazabal, who had to play two qualifying rounds, finished at 15-under 269.
